name: THE ISLAND (dark.H)
description:
Title: THE ISLAND
Genre: adventure game
Read Time: About 5 to 10 minutes
STORY
Hi I'm Dark.H. My adventure game will include pioneering, survival, production, and interaction with people.
The main character runs a yacht tour company. One day, while going on a tour, the boat is broken by a typhoon. The main character lives on the island, searches about the island, and meets the people, so the story begins.
